Author: RosieNP
Text: Aw, man, I'm sorry. You must be feeling terrible right now, but remember that you didn't choose to have an eating disorder. It's a sickness like any other. You're dealing with symptoms of your disorder and you deserve compassion. I hope you can turn things around a bit soon. Have you talked to a doctor? If binge eating is your problem, there are a couple meds that can help...
